name: Ori
flavorText: A small feline predator that scratches everything with his claws, but can purr to calm friends.

abilities.name: Calm Purr
abilities.text: Once per turn, you may prevent all damage to this Pokémon. This power is disabled if your opponent has a Supporter in play.

attacks.name: Clawed Stride
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.
